# Load Dataset
```{r}
data <- read.csv("~/Downloads/flight_delays.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
str(data)
```

```{r}
# Research Question: What are the key factors that predict arrival delays?

# initial multiple linear regression model.
model_multiple <- lm(DelayMinutes ~ DelayReason + Origin + Destination + AircraftType + Airline + Cancelled + Distance + Diverted, data = data)
summary(model_multiple)

# Use stepwise regression to analyze predictors
model_multiple_step <- step(model_multiple, direction = "both")
summary(model_multiple_step)
```

```{r}
# least variable model with strongest predictor
model_least <- lm(DelayMinutes ~ DelayReason, data = data)
summary(model_least)
```

```{r}
# semi complete model
model_optimal <- lm(DelayMinutes ~ DelayReason + Origin + AircraftType, data = data)

# model with the best predictive power that includes key prescriptive variables
summary(model_optimal)
```
